simlib.io.read_pdb¶

simlib.io.read_pdb(filename, backend='python')[source]¶

Read PDB file and return Trajectory

PDB format can be described in depth at http://www.wwpdb.org/documentation/file-format.

Parameters

  • filename (str) – Name of PDB file to be read

  • backend (str) – (Default: ‘pandas’).

Returns

Trajectory of PDB

Return type

simlib.Trajectory

Previous topic

simlib.io.read_dcd

Next topic

simlib.statistics
